import sys

# input
r, g, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# output
if (r*100 + g*10 + b) % 4 == 0:
    print('YES')
else:
    print('NO')

import sys

r = int(sys.stdin.readline())
g = int(sys.stdin.readline())
b = int(sys.stdin.readline())

if (100 * r + 10 * g + b) % 4 == 0:
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")
